newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish air force training plane crashes.
newsitem.headline: Turkish air force training plane crashes.

text.p: A Turkish air force training plane crashed on Wednesday near a coastal resort town in western Turkey but the two crew members parachuted to safety, the state-run Anatolian news agency said.

The agency said the T-37-C type light aircraft crashed near Dikili town in Izmir province at 0950 local time (0750 GMT). The agency quoted witnesses as saying the plane blew up after hitting a mountain.
It was not known why the accident occurred, Anatolian said.
